trans-unit.source: . [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: . [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Add .mo files which were missing in 1.1.1. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Adicionar ficheiros .mo que estavam em falta em 1.1.1.[davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Add CSRF protection token [ebrehault]
trans-unit.target: Adicionar ficha de protecção CSRF [ebrehault]

trans-unit.source: Add Python 2 / 3 compatibility [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: 增加Python 2/3的兼容性[pbauer]。

trans-unit.source: Add a “protected” method to IFieldFactory that may be used to determine if a particular field must be non editable and not movable using the editor (just like a behavior field). Override it for custom behavior in a subclass. [ebrehault]
trans-unit.target: Add a “protected” method to IFieldFactory that may be used to determine if a particular field must be non editable and not movable using the editor (just like a behavior field). Override it for custom behavior in a subclass. [ebrehault]

trans-unit.source: Add a date-only field with no time component. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 增加一个没有时间成分的仅有日期的字段。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Add an “available” method to IFieldFactory that may be used to determine if a field factory is actually available in the current context. This always returns True in the base class. Override it if a field factory isn’t useful unless conditions are met. Example: we can’t use a field factory for RelationChoice unless the relationfield is activated in the Plone instance. [smcmahon]
trans-unit.target: Add an “available” method to IFieldFactory that may be used to determine if a field factory is actually available in the current context. This always returns True in the base class. Override it if a field factory isn’t useful unless conditions are met. Example: we can’t use a field factory for RelationChoice unless the relationfield is activated in the Plone instance. [smcmahon]

trans-unit.source: Add an “editable” method to IFieldFactory that may be used to determine if a particular field is editable. Rationale: fields customized via XML editing are sometimes not going to be editable via schemaeditor due to an inability to handle custom vocabularies or sources. The field factory utility is a very convenient place to test this since it’s already used to determine available fields and their addability.
trans-unit.target: Add an “editable” method to IFieldFactory that may be used to determine if a particular field is editable. Rationale: fields customized via XML editing are sometimes not going to be editable via schemaeditor due to an inability to handle custom vocabularies or sources. The field factory utility is a very convenient place to test this since it’s already used to determine available fields and their addability.

trans-unit.source: Add another possible base to try for our fixed IDatetime, since plone.app.z3cform may change which one takes precedence. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 为我们固定的IDatetime添加另一个可能的基础,因为plone.app.z3cform可能会改变哪一个优先。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Add coding headers on python files. [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: 在python文件上添加编码头。[gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Add fields in field editing UI to the current selected fieldset. [thet]
trans-unit.target: 在字段编辑界面中,将字段添加到当前选定的字段集中。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Add fieldsWhichCannotBeDeleted attribute to SchemaContext, which can be used to disallow removal of certain fields. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Acrescentar os campos cujo atributo não pode ser eliminado a SchemaContext,que podem ser utilizados para desautorizar a remoção de certos campos.[davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Add more specific events for when a field is added or removed. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Adicionar eventos mais específicos para quando um campo é adicionado ou removido.[davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Add support for non-destructive editing of attributes with i18n Message values [datakurre]
trans-unit.target: Adicionar suporte para edição não destrutiva de atributos com valores de mensagens i18n [datakurre].

trans-unit.source: Add the ability to define vocabularies of simple TextLine values. Both single and multiple select fields are provided. [rossp]
trans-unit.target: 增加定义简单的TextLine值的词汇表的能力。同时提供了单个和多个选择字段。[rossp]

trans-unit.source: Add undeclared zope.cachedescriptors dependency. [timo]
trans-unit.target: Acrescentar dependência não declarada de zope.cachedescriptors.[timo]

trans-unit.source: Added French translation. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Acrescentada a tradução francesa.[thomasdesvenain].

trans-unit.source: Added Italian translation. [giacomos]
trans-unit.target: 增加了意大利语翻译。[giacomos]

trans-unit.source: Added ReadOnlySchemaListing for listing fields without making them editable. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 添加了ReadOnlySchemaListing,用于列举字段而不使其可编辑。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Added Spanish translation. [hvelarde]
trans-unit.target: 增加了西班牙语翻译。[hvelarde]

trans-unit.source: Added internationalization and extracted messages for main languages. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Adicionada a internacionalização e extraídas mensagens para as principais línguas.[thomasdesvenain].

trans-unit.source: Added overlay support to the field edit screens. [davisagli, limi]
trans-unit.target: 在字段编辑屏幕上添加了覆盖支持。[davisagli,limi]

trans-unit.source: Added pt_BR translation. [ericof]
trans-unit.target: Acrescentada a tradução pt_BR.[ericof].

trans-unit.source: Added robot tests. [davisp, cedricmessiant, thomasdesvenain at toulouse-sprint]
trans-unit.target: Adicionados testes com robôs.[davisp,cedricmessiant,thomasdesvenain at toulouse-sprint].

trans-unit.source: Alex Limi
trans-unit.target: Alex Limi

trans-unit.source: Allow defaults to be set on dexterity type fields via the web UI (@@fields) [ezvirtual]
trans-unit.target: 允许通过web UI为灵巧类型字段设置默认值(@@字段)[ezvirtual]。

trans-unit.source: Allow specifying a vocabulary in the form of key|label in (multi)choice fields [tomgross]
trans-unit.target: Allow specifying a vocabulary in the form of key|label in (multi)choice fields [tomgross]

trans-unit.source: Allow specifying a vocabulary in the form of key|label in (multi)choice fields as seen at PFG. [tomgross]
trans-unit.target: 允许在(多)选择字段中以key|label的形式指定词汇,如PFG所见。[Tomgross]

trans-unit.source: Allow to hide the ‘Save defaults’ button [ebrehault]
trans-unit.target: Allow to hide the ‘Save defaults’ button [ebrehault]

trans-unit.source: Author:
trans-unit.target: 作者:

trans-unit.source: Avoid errors when expanding the range of
trans-unit.target: Evite erros ao expandir a gama de

trans-unit.source: Better string normalization when setting field id from field title (change accented or special characters with corresponding letters). [cedricmessiant]
trans-unit.target: Melhor normalização das cordas ao definir a id do campo a partir do título do campo (alterar caracteres acentuados ou especiais com letras correspondentes).[cedricmessiant].

trans-unit.source: Bool
trans-unit.target: Bool

trans-unit.source: Breaking changes:
trans-unit.target: 突破性的变化。

trans-unit.source: Bug fixes:
trans-unit.target: 错误修复。

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: Validate short names of fields. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 错误修正:验证字段的短名。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: CSS tweaks [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: CSS调整 [davisagli]
Change js事件用于从keyup到change动态设置标题中的id;自动完成不会引发keyup事件,但会启动change。[smcmahon]

trans-unit.source: Changed API methods and arguments to mixedCase to be more consistent with the rest of Zope. This is a non-backwards-compatible change. Our profuse apologies, but it’s now or never. :-/
trans-unit.target: Changed API methods and arguments to mixedCase to be more consistent with the rest of Zope. This is a non-backwards-compatible change. Our profuse apologies, but it’s now or never. :-/

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Choice (with simple list of values)
trans-unit.target: 选择(有简单的数值列表)

trans-unit.source: Clean up testing setup. This solves some serious test isolation issues. [timo]
trans-unit.target: Limpar a configuração dos testes.Isto resolve alguns problemas sérios de isolamento dos testes.[timo]

trans-unit.source: Cleaner implementation of bypassing required check for setting default values, which actually works [tomgross]
trans-unit.target: 更简洁地实现了绕过设置默认值所需的检查,这实际上是可行的 [tomgross]。

trans-unit.source: Cleanup: - Remove Plone 4 related form tabbing CSS selectors from fields editing UI JavaScript. - Better code reuse. [thet]
trans-unit.target: 清理。-从编辑UI JavaScript的字段中删除Plone 4相关的表单标签CSS选择器。-更好的代码重用。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Contributors:
trans-unit.target: 撰稿人:

trans-unit.source: Correct packaging issues in 1.3.2. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: Problemas de embalagem correctos em 1.3.2.[esteele].

trans-unit.source: Credits
trans-unit.target: 学分

trans-unit.source: Currently there is support for:
trans-unit.target: 目前支持的有:

trans-unit.source: Datetime
trans-unit.target: 日期

trans-unit.source: David Glick (dglick@gmail.com)
trans-unit.target: David Glick (dglick@gmail.com)

trans-unit.source: Default to adding Textline fields. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 默认为添加文本行字段。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Deleting fieldsets is now possible through the UI. (#69)
trans-unit.target: 现在可以通过用户界面删除字段集。(#69)

trans-unit.source: Dependencies
trans-unit.target: 依赖性

trans-unit.source: Despite the namespace, Plone is not a dependency.
trans-unit.target: 尽管有命名空间,但Plone并不是一个依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Display fields from behaviors in the schema preview too. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Mostrar também campos de comportamentos na pré-visualização do esquema.[davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Don’t depend on popupform.js [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Don’t depend on popupform.js [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Don’t show an error when a “required” field doesn’t have a default. Also added a “Done” button. (#71)
trans-unit.target: Don’t show an error when a “required” field doesn’t have a default. Also added a “Done” button. (#71)

trans-unit.source: Edit field defaults from the schema listing instead of in the field overlays. This simplifies making sure that the default can’t be set to invalid values. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Edit field defaults from the schema listing instead of in the field overlays. This simplifies making sure that the default can’t be set to invalid values. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fall back to normal traversal if a field isn’t found when traversing the schema context. This fixes inline validation for forms on the schema context. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fall back to normal traversal if a field isn’t found when traversing the schema context. This fixes inline validation for forms on the schema context. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fields
trans-unit.target: 领域

trans-unit.source: Fieldsets wysiwyg management. We can add fieldsets to a schema. We can change the fieldset of a field by drag and drop. Fields reorder now works when we have fieldsets. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Fieldsets wysiwyg management.Podemos adicionar conjuntos de campos a um esquema.Podemos alterar o conjunto de campos de um campo por arrastar e largar.Os campos reordenados agora funcionam quando temos conjuntos de campos.[thomasdesvenain].

trans-unit.source: Fix
trans-unit.target: 修复

trans-unit.source: Fix French translation. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Consertar a tradução francesa.[thomasdesvenain].

trans-unit.source: Fix POST AJAX-URL for reordering fields [tomgross]
trans-unit.target: 修正POST AJAX-URL的重新排序字段[tomgross]。

trans-unit.source: Fix Schemaeditor fields editing UI to be able to move fields into another fieldset. Fixes: #30. [thet]
trans-unit.target: 修正Schemaeditor字段编辑界面,可以将字段移动到另一个字段集。修正 #30.[thet]

trans-unit.source: Fix broken import from
trans-unit.target: 修复了导入错误的问题,从

trans-unit.source: Fix delete method (it used to return html and it produced a plone.protect warning) [ebrehault]
trans-unit.target: Fixar método de eliminação (utilizava para devolver html e produzia um aviso plone.protector)[ebrehault][ebrehault

trans-unit.source: Fix fields not being reorderable and missing their delete confirmation until a fieldset was added. Fixes https://github.com/collective/collective.easyform/issues/81 and https://github.com/collective/collective.easyform/issues/82 [thet]
trans-unit.target: Fix fields not being reorderable and missing their delete confirmation until a fieldset was added. Fixes https://github.com/collective/collective.easyform/issues/81 and https://github.com/collective/collective.easyform/issues/82 [thet]

trans-unit.source: Fix getting vocabulary for multichoice fields [tomgross]
trans-unit.target: 修正获取多选项字段的词汇 [tomgross]。

trans-unit.source: Fix inline validation for the field edit form. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 修正字段编辑表单的内联验证。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix issue where serializing vocabulary terms into ‘|’ syntax failed when values contained non-ascii characters [datakurre]
trans-unit.target: Fix issue where serializing vocabulary terms into ‘|’ syntax failed when values contained non-ascii characters [datakurre]

trans-unit.source: Fix issue with moving fields to position 0 in a schema. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 修正在模式中移动字段到0位置的问题。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix javascript to reorder fields. It was conflicting with mockup jquery.event.(drag|drop). [vangheem]
trans-unit.target: Consertar javascript para reordenar campos.Estava em conflito com mockup jquery.event.(drag|drop).[vangheem].

trans-unit.source: Fix packaging error. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: 修复包装错误。[esteele]

trans-unit.source: Fix removeField for EditableSchema to allow for the case where there is no fieldset on the schema [ianderso]
trans-unit.target: Fixar removeField para EditableSchema para permitir o caso em que não exista um conjunto de campos no esquema [ianderso].

trans-unit.source: Fix schemaeditor.js to work with jQuery 1.9+. [bloodbare]
trans-unit.target: Fixar schemaeditor.js para trabalhar com jQuery 1.9+.[desprovido de sangue].

trans-unit.source: Fix test failures on Jenkins. [timo]
trans-unit.target: Corrigir falhas de teste em Jenkins.[timo]

trans-unit.source: Fix test setup for Zope 4. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 修正Zope 4的测试设置。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix test. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Fix test.[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Fix tests for fieldset ordering changes in plone.supermodel. [thet]
trans-unit.target: Arreglar las pruebas para el cambio de orden de los sets de campo en plone.supermodelo.[thet]

trans-unit.source: Fix tests in py3 and some py3 issues. [pbauer]
trans-unit.target: 修正py3中的测试和一些py3问题。[pbauer]

trans-unit.source: Fix tests. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Testes de reparação.[davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Fix translation and sorting of field names. [MacYET, davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Corrigir a tradução e classificação dos nomes dos campos.[MacYET,davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Fixed deleting field from fieldset. [kroman0]
trans-unit.target: Campo de eliminação fixo do conjunto de campos.[kroman0]

trans-unit.source: Fixed drag and drop fields in fieldsets when form tabbing is disabled: we can drop a field into the fieldset legend (for example, when the fieldset is empty), or directly positioning it beside fields of the new fieldset. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Campos fixos de arrastar e largar em conjuntos de campos quando a tabulação do formulário está desactivada:podemos largar um campo na legenda do conjunto de campos (por exemplo,quando o conjunto de campos está vazio),ou posicioná-lo directamente ao lado de campos do novo conjunto de campos.[thomasdesvenain].

trans-unit.source: Fixed: on a multi selection field with a vocabulary name, when the field had been generated from a model, the vocabulary name was not selected on edit form. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Fixo:num campo de selecção múltipla com um nome de vocabulário,quando o campo tinha sido gerado a partir de um modelo,o nome do vocabulário não era seleccionado no formulário de edição.[thomasdesvenain].

trans-unit.source: Fixes:
trans-unit.target: 修复。

trans-unit.source: Float
trans-unit.target: 浮动

trans-unit.source: Hide the ‘read only’ setting for fields. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Hide the ‘read only’ setting for fields. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Honor cancel button in field editor popup. [smcmahon]
trans-unit.target: 在字段编辑器弹出的荣誉取消按钮。[smcmahon]

trans-unit.source: I18n improved by adding many missing strings [giacomos]
trans-unit.target: 通过增加许多缺失的字符串,改进了I18n[iacomos]。

trans-unit.source: If you find that you get import errors or unknown keyword arguments in your code, please change names from foo_bar too fooBar, e.g. add_field() becomes addField(). [optilude]
trans-unit.target: 如果你发现你的代码中出现导入错误或未知的关键字参数,请将foo_bar的名称改为fooBar,例如add_field()变成addField()。[optilude]

trans-unit.source: Import test browser from Testing.testbrowser instead of Products.Five.testbrowser [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 从Testing.testbrowser导入测试浏览器,而不是Products.Five.testbrowser [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: In addition to the normal object events raised when fields are added, edited, and removed, raise a SchemaModifiedEvent on the schema context. This greatly simplifies writing code to serialize schema changes, and makes it possible to track of the schema origin so that we know where to serialize it. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 除了在添加、编辑和删除字段时引发的普通对象事件外,还在模式上下文上引发一个SchemaModifiedEvent。这极大地简化了编写代码来序列化模式变化的过程,并且可以跟踪模式的来源,以便我们知道在哪里序列化它。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Initial release
trans-unit.target: 初次发布

trans-unit.source: Int
trans-unit.target: 国际

trans-unit.source: Integrated addTokenToUrl from plone.protect.utils on generated delete url. [Luke Brannon]
trans-unit.target: Integrado addTokenToUrl de plone.protect.utils em url de eliminação gerada.[Luke Brannon].

trans-unit.source: Internationalize delete field confirmation message. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Internacionalizar mensagem de confirmação de eliminação de campo.[thomasdesvenain].

trans-unit.source: Introduction
trans-unit.target: 介紹

trans-unit.source: JavaScript formating according to style guides. [thet]
trans-unit.target: 根据样式指南进行JavaScript格式化。[thet]

trans-unit.source: Limit the height of text areas in the schema listing to avoid extra scrolling. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Limitar a altura das áreas de texto na listagem do esquema para evitar a rolagem extra.[davisagli].

trans-unit.source: List of Choice (with simple list of values)
trans-unit.target: 选择列表(含简单的值列表)

trans-unit.source: List the available field type vocabulary alphabetically. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 按字母顺序列出可用的字段类型词汇。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Major package cleanup. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 主要清理包。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Make
trans-unit.target: 作る

trans-unit.source: Make FieldFactory do a deep copy of its arguments to avoid problems with mutable defaults getting shared between field instances. This fixes http://code.google.com/p/dexterity/issues/detail?id=133 [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Make FieldFactory do a deep copy of its arguments to avoid problems with mutable defaults getting shared between field instances. This fixes http://code.google.com/p/dexterity/issues/detail?id=133 [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Make fieldset creation optional [ebrehault]
trans-unit.target: Tornar a criação do conjunto de campos opcional [ebrehault]

trans-unit.source: Make it possible for schema contexts to restrict the fields that can be added by defining an allowedFields property. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Tornar possível aos contextos de esquemas restringir os campos que podem ser adicionados através da definição de uma propriedadeFields permitida.[davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Make it possible to make the schemaeditor not be the default view of the schema context, by specifying the
trans-unit.target: Tornar possível que o schemaeditor não seja a visão padrão do contexto do schema,especificando o

trans-unit.source: Make new boolean fields use the radio widget by default. The field now appears as “Yes/No” in the list of field types. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Make new boolean fields use the radio widget by default. The field now appears as “Yes/No” in the list of field types. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Make sure that normalized ids for new fields use _ instead of -, so that they can be accessed without using getattr. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 确保新字段的规范化id使用_而不是-,这样就可以在不使用getattr的情况下访问它们。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Martin Aspeli
trans-unit.target: Martin Aspeli

trans-unit.source: Nathan Van Gheem
trans-unit.target: Nathan Van Gheem

trans-unit.source: New features:
trans-unit.target: 新特点:

trans-unit.source: No longer provide a field factory for zope.schema.Bytes, since plone.namedfile provides a better file field and now registers its own field factories. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 不再为zope.schema.Bytes提供字段工厂,因为plone.namedfile提供了更好的文件字段,现在注册了自己的字段工厂。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Note: This package is released under a BSD license. Contributors, please do not add dependencies on GPL code.
trans-unit.target: 注意:这个软件包是在BSD许可下发布的。贡献者,请不要添加对GPL代码的依赖。

trans-unit.source: Omit the ‘required’ and ‘missing_value’ fields for Bool fields. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Omit the ‘required’ and ‘missing_value’ fields for Bool fields. [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: On multiple choice fields (List of Choice), read/write attributes other than
trans-unit.target: 在多选字段(选择列表)上,除了读/写属性外,还可以读/写以下属性

trans-unit.source: On the listing, respect the SchemaContext label if supplied. Otherwise, build one based on the title. This gives us more label flexibility outside the dexterity schemaeditor context. [smcmahon]
trans-unit.target: Na listagem,respeitar a etiqueta SchemaContext se fornecida.Caso contrário,construir uma com base no título.Isto dá-nos mais flexibilidade de etiqueta fora do contexto do esquema de destreza do editor.[smcmahon].

trans-unit.source: Override base field interfaces to get the correct field types for the default and missing_value fields, rather than using the MetaFieldWidgetFactory. [rossp]
trans-unit.target: 重写基本字段接口,为默认字段和缺失值字段获取正确的字段类型,而不是使用MetaFieldWidgetFactory。[rossp]

trans-unit.source: Password
trans-unit.target: 密码

trans-unit.source: Prevent the user from creating fields with names that are reserved for Dublin Core metadata.
trans-unit.target: Impedir o utilizador de criar campos com nomes reservados para os metadados do Dublin Core.

trans-unit.source: Provides through-the-web editing of a zope schema/interface.
trans-unit.target: 提供zope模式/界面的网络编辑。

trans-unit.source: Quote attribute value in xtags attribute style jquery selector used in prepOverlay for field settings. Absence of quote was causing a js error on clicking “Settings in schema editor. [smcmahon]
trans-unit.target: Quote attribute value in xtags attribute style jquery selector used in prepOverlay for field settings. Absence of quote was causing a js error on clicking “Settings in schema editor. [smcmahon]

trans-unit.source: Relicense under the BSD license. See http://plone.org/foundation/materials/foundation-resolutions/plone-framework-components-relicensing-policy [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Relicense under the BSD license. See http://plone.org/foundation/materials/foundation-resolutions/plone-framework-components-relicensing-policy [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Remove backward compatibility with old collective.z3cform.datetimewidget from Plone 4.3 times. [jensens] (#74)
trans-unit.target: 从Plone 4.3次删除与旧的collective.z3cform.datetimewidget的向后兼容性。[jensens](#74)

trans-unit.source: Remove dependency on zope.app.schema. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 删除对zope.app.schema的依赖。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Remove unhelpful help text for min_length and max_length fields. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Remover texto de ajuda inútil para os campos min_length e max_length.[davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Remove unneeded dependency on plone.i18n. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 删除对plone.i18n的不需要的依赖。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Remove unused locales folder, translations are now in plone.app.locales [vincentfretin]
trans-unit.target: Eliminar la carpeta de locales sin usar,las traducciones están ahora en plone.app.locales [vincentfretin]

trans-unit.source: Removed support for setting the
trans-unit.target: 删除了对设置

trans-unit.source: Removed the JavascriptFormWrapper. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 删除了JavascriptFormWrapper。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Removed very old import conditions [tomgross]
trans-unit.target: 删除了非常老的进口条件[tomgross]

trans-unit.source: Revamped UI to show WYSIWYG representation of fields. [davisagli, limi]
trans-unit.target: 改版UI,显示所见即所得的字段表示方式。[davisagli,limi]

trans-unit.source: Ross Patterson
trans-unit.target: Ross Patterson

trans-unit.source: See plone.app.dexterity (along with plone.dexterity and plone.supermodel) for one approach to this integration.
trans-unit.target: 参见plone.app.dexterity(以及plone.dexterity和plone.supermodel)来了解这种整合的一种方法。

trans-unit.source: Steve McMahon
trans-unit.target: 史蒂夫-麦克马洪

trans-unit.source: Support non-ASCII characters in vocabularies for Choice fields. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 在选择字段的词汇表中支持非ASCII字符。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Support zope.interface >= 5. [jensens] (#75)
trans-unit.target: Support zope.interface >= 5. [jensens] (#75)

trans-unit.source: Supports additionalSchemata in field Add form. [ebrehault]
trans-unit.target: ApoiaSchemata adicional no campo Adicionar formulário.[ebrehault]

trans-unit.source: Test-Fix: Support latest zope.i18nmessageid. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: 测试-修复:支持最新的zope.i18nmessageid。[jensens]

trans-unit.source: Text
trans-unit.target: Tekst

trans-unit.source: TextLine
trans-unit.target: 文字线

trans-unit.source: The field edit form now respects autoform hints. Additional schemata can be provided by registering an adapter of the schema context and field to
trans-unit.target: O formulário de edição de campo respeita agora as dicas de forma automática.Podem ser fornecidos esquemas adicionais através do registo de um adaptador do contexto do esquema e do campo para

trans-unit.source: The following field types (from zope.schema) are currently supported:
trans-unit.target: 目前支持以下字段类型(来自zope.schema)。

trans-unit.source: The schema listing preview now respects autoform hints (such as custom widgets). [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: A pré-visualização da listagem de esquemas respeita agora as dicas de autoformação (tais como widgets personalizados).[davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Third-party packages can make additional field types available by registering new IFieldFactory utilities.
trans-unit.target: 第三方软件包可以通过注册新的IFieldFactory实用程序来提供额外的字段类型。

trans-unit.source: Thomas Desvenain
trans-unit.target: Thomas Desvenain

trans-unit.source: Update code follow Plone styleguide. [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: 按照Plone样式指南更新代码。[gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Update markup and javscript for Plone 5. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Actualização da marcação e javscript para Plone 5.[davisagli].

trans-unit.source: Update url in setup.py to point to github. [esteele]
trans-unit.target: Actualizar la url en setup.py para que apunte a github.[Esteele]

trans-unit.source: Updated fr translation. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Actualização da tradução fr.[thomasdesvenain].

trans-unit.source: Use __parent__ instead of aq_parent. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 用__parent__代替aq_parent。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Use a set of choice fields for the “multiple choice” field option in the UI, instead of a list of choice fields. The latter is orderable and is a less common use case (plus we need a better widget for it). [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: Use a set of choice fields for the “multiple choice” field option in the UI, instead of a list of choice fields. The latter is orderable and is a less common use case (plus we need a better widget for it). [davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Use a different id for field edit form and listing form, to ease reuse of overlay behaviours. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Utilizar uma identificação diferente para formulário de edição de campo e formulário de listagem,para facilitar a reutilização de comportamentos de sobreposição.[thomasdesvenain]

trans-unit.source: Use plone domain for translations. [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: 使用plone域名进行翻译。[gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Use test browser from plone.testing for compatibility with Zope 4 [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 使用plone.test测试浏览器与Zope 4的兼容性[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Use the shared ‘Plone test setup’ and ‘Plone test teardown’ keywords in Robot tests. [Rotonen] (#66)
trans-unit.target: Use the shared ‘Plone test setup’ and ‘Plone test teardown’ keywords in Robot tests. [Rotonen] (#66)

trans-unit.source: Use zope.interface decorator. [gforcada]
trans-unit.target: 使用zope.interface decorator。[gforcada]

trans-unit.source: Use zope.lifecycleevent. [hannosch]
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o zope.lifecycleevent.[hannosch].

trans-unit.source: Validate input for the
trans-unit.target: 验证输入

trans-unit.source: We can select a vocabulary factory on a choice field, among all registered vocabularies. We don’t have an error anymore when we edit a choice field with a vocabulary factory. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: We can select a vocabulary factory on a choice field, among all registered vocabularies. We don’t have an error anymore when we edit a choice field with a vocabulary factory. [thomasdesvenain]

trans-unit.source: We can set a fieldset description. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Podemos definir uma descrição do conjunto de campos.[thomasdesvenain].

trans-unit.source: We can set that field is required or not required on add form. [thomasdesvenain]
trans-unit.target: Podemos definir que o campo é obrigatório ou não no formulário de adição.[thomasdesvenain].

trans-unit.source: plone.schemaeditor only handles the actual schema editing. To be useful, it requires some integration code to take care of the following pieces:
trans-unit.target: plone.schemaeditor只处理实际的模式编辑。为了让它更有用,它需要一些集成代码来处理以下几个部分。

trans-unit.source: plone.schemaeditor provides a through-the-web interface for modifying Zope 3 schemata (interfaces).
trans-unit.target: plone.schemaeditor提供了一个用于修改Zope 3 schemata(接口)的网络接口。
